section_title: Issues relating to greenhouse gas inventories
sentences: The Secretariat presented results from a training programme for review experts under Protocol Article 8 on review of national communications ( FCCC/SBSTA/2006/INF.7 ).
Chair Kumarsingh suggested parties begin a review of Protocol Article 7.1(a nnual inventories) on a voluntary basis, especially Decision 26/CMP.1(t iming and scope of review).
